description: Aristocrat George Vidanov's weekend guests--Tomas Dombai, Martin Hubai and David Vidak-can't wait to spend some quality time with their host. As the threesome unpack their things, Tomas is overtaken by desire.  In no time he gets his fellow travelers out of their trappings and services their stiff cocks with oral expertise.  Martin lays down and Tomas rides him like a crazed rodeo rider astride a bucking bronco. David takes his turn inside Tomas until finally all three men have peaked.
title: Falcon Crest, Scene #01
